name: Ailin: Traps and Treasures
description:
Ailin: Traps and Treasures is a block-pushing puzzle game inspired by classics like Sokoban and Minesweeper.

Help treasure-hunter Ailin to collect treasures from tombs. Move the treasure chests to extraction points and avoid traps. Detect mines and plan your movements carefully. Create levels and share them with other players.

Features

  • 50 various levels
  • Classic block-pushing gameplay
  • New game mechanics
  • Build-in level editor and community levels
  • Controller support
